title: The Aitch Interview: Blowing Up, Subway collab, Ed Sheeran, Aardee Comparisons & More
description:
Aitch talks about his rise, going up at a young age, recently signed, relationship with Offset Jim, Aardee, Ed Sheeran, new album on the way and more! https://www.instagram.com/aitch/
https://twitter.com/OfficialAitch
